Topic.Title: Can we publish games from a Chromebook?

Posts.EditableText: I use the browser version of Quest to work on my gamebook because I can't download Quest on a chromebook. I tried to publish chapter 1, but it turns out you have to download the game in order to submit it for publication, so I downloaded it as a .zip file and tried to submit it. Then I got an error saying there was no html detected in the file. Can you publish games here from a chromebook? Do I need to convert the game's file type to something else before submitting it? What am I doing wrong?
Posts.HTML: I use the browser version of Quest to work on my gamebook because I can't download Quest on a chromebook. I tried to publish chapter 1, but it turns out you have to download the game in order to submit it for publication, so I downloaded it as a .zip file and tried to submit it. Then I got an error saying there was no html detected in the file. Can you publish games here from a chromebook? Do I need to convert the game's file type to something else before submitting it? What am I doing wrong?

Posts.EditableText: It uploads as a single file ( .quest). I am pretty sure you can just unzip the file for it.
Posts.HTML: It uploads as a single file ( .quest). I am pretty sure you can just unzip the file for it.

Posts.EditableText: I will try that, thank you!
Why would you need to download the game? Does the "publish" button not work?
Posts.HTML: Why would you need to download the game? Does the "publish" button not work?
